column1: "description": "Five friends head to a remote cabin
column2: where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival."
a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok."

column1: "description": "An art auctioneer who has become mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting."
"description": "A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity."

column1: "description": "A man and woman are drawn together

column1: "description": "A cave exploration in Ukraine leads to the unearthing of a story of World War II survivors who once found shelter in the same cave."
"description": "A documentary that chronicles the life of young college professor Angela Davis

column4: and her name on the FBI's 10 most wanted list."

column1: "description": "A painter struggling for inspiration finds an unexpected muse after he accepts a teaching position in a small town and becomes the caregiver to Eddie
column2: a seemingly docile art student with a rare sleepwalking condition."

column1: "description": "A female forensic psychiatrist discovers that all of one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished."

column2: they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon."
Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma
column3: where problems arise. Their church's Spanish-born pastor struggles with his faith
column4: while Neil encounters a woman from his childhood."

column1: "description": "A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world."

column2: WWII: A group of British and German soldiers find themselves stranded in the wilderness after an aircraft battle. Finding shelter in the same cabin

column1: "description": "While on vacation with friends in Hyderabad

column1: "description": "A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself."

column1: "description": "A promising hip-hop rhymer from Los Angeles finds herself in a gray area when a record producer offers her a compromising shot at stardom."

"description": "A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong."
"description": "A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding."

column1: "description": "A farming family's business is threatened by an unexpected crisis
